CC ACTIONS: Upload onto Image Server and label in standard format
View sample Images to check: Language/ image quality/ readability.

TRANSCRIBER: Register as a Transcriber if not already done. Note: only 1 UserID per Person and 1 Syndicate Coordinator per person
Review Place Names on RAP and identify Availability of images. Request of SC.

SC ACTIONS: Receive request for a batch of images from Transcriber who has searched the RAP
Scan Image Server for chosen place name. Request allocation of new Images batch for particular Transcriber
Request allocation BY CC of chosen Images for Transcriber.
Allocate requested Images. Update REGISTER records.
Advise Transcriber. If a new Transcriber -  monitor their progress/ ability. Revise allocation if necessary or request checks as necessary.

TRANSCRIBER: Transcribe allocated Images. Seek help from Sc if necessary. Pass to SC for review if requested.

SC ACTIONS: Check Transcription when image batch [ or designated portion if new transcriber] is complete.
Agree Transcriber can upload themselves or upload on behalf of transcriber.

TRANSCRIBER: Upload own Transcription. Tell SC if this is part or whole of the allocated set.

SC ACTIONS: Rectify errors or return to Transcriber.

TRANSCRIBER: Rectify errors in conjunction with SC.

SC ACTIONS: When whole bundle of Images is transcribed and uploaded. Advise CC to update records.

CC ACTIONS: Scan Decadal for date issues and any other statistical work.
Run stats scan monthly to assess UCF usage and errors rates per transcriber. Advise SC.
Receive and review data error reports from researcher and pass to SC if action needed

SC ACTIONS: Receive and review data error reports from CC and pass to Transcriber if action needed and latter still active

TRANSCRIBER: Receive and review data error reports from SC and action

SC ACTIONS: Action correction if transcriber in active
